recipe.title: Maru
ingredients: 4 ounces freshly squeezed mandarin orange juice
instructions: 1. Muddle the blackberries in the bottom of a cocktail shaker. Fill the shaker halfway full with ice cubes, add the mandarin orange juice, Chambord, and St-Germain, and shake vigorously.
2. Strain into four goblets or wine glasses, top with the Sapporo, and serve.
